conversations.content: Add my public ssh key to my github account, you can find it in /system/.ssh.

[{'name': 'id_rsa', 'type': 'file', 'permissions': {'read': True, 'write': False, 'execute': False}}, {'name': 'id_rsa.pub', 'type': 'file', 'permissions': {'read': True, 'write': True, 'execute': False}}]

<|Function_Thought|>
We have successfully listed the directory contents of /system/.ssh. The public SSH key is typically stored in the file named `id_rsa.pub`. Now, I will proceed to read the contents of this file to obtain the SSH key.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[read_file(path="/system/.ssh/id_rsa.pub")]<|/Function_Call|>

<|Function_Thought|>
The public SSH key has been successfully extracted from the `id_rsa.pub` file. Now, I will proceed to add this SSH key to the GitHub account.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[git_add_ssh_key(ssh_key="ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAABIwAAAQEAr")]<|/Function_Call|>
You should verify your account first. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The SSH key addition to the GitHub account requires account verification. An OTP has been sent to the inbox. I will now proceed to retrieve the received emails to find the OTP for verification.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_received_emails()]<|/Function_Call|>

  body: 'Hi Emma,

    to push the file after accepting the invitation.

    Thank you very much for your help.

    Best regards, Alice'

<|Function_Thought|>
I have found the OTP required for verifying the account in order to add the SSH key. The OTP is `137132`. I will now proceed with verifying the account using this OTP.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[verify_github_account(otp="137132")]<|/Function_Call|>
Account verified. SSH key successfully added to your account.

<|Final_Answer|>
The public SSH key has been successfully added to your GitHub account after verification. If there's anything else you need, feel free to ask!
<|/Final_Answer|>
